header.tagline: Senior Construction Estimator – Infrastructure & Commercial Projects

summary: Expert estimator with 15+ years in civil projects, specializing in infrastructure projects, commercial construction, and cost management. Delivered 40% cost efficiencies and consistently completed projects under budget by 10%.

bullets.text: Led the detailed quantity take-off for multiple temple complexes, managing projects with total built and external areas exceeding 753,480 sq ft, ensuring compliance with client specifications.
Conducted cost estimation for Cultura Inglesa English School projects, managing contracts valued at over $2.8M while implementing more cost-effective construction methodologies.
Coordinated the expansion of childcare facilities, overhauling design to optimize budget while successful project delivery on a contract valued at $1.2M.
Performed quantity take-offs and estimated office work for GOOGLE RIO YT FI09 project, effectively bringing project bids under initial budget projections.
Secured high-rise residential building finance approvals, aligning estimated budgets and specification documents with stringent banking standards.
Produced compliant technical drawings, meeting accessibility standards for residential buildings and improving construction project efficiency.
Executed preliminary budgeting for terminal station projects, achieving a total project value of $3.5Million through efficient resource management.
Delivered accounts and documentation for significant projects like the Gippsland Line Upgrade, ensuring on-time completion within the set budget framework.
Led teams in tendering processes, resulting in successful bids including major road and level crossing projects valued over $7.6Million.
Managed all phases of cost consultation for large projects, such as the West Gate Tunnel Project, yielding a project worth of $1.5Million.
Enhanced scope clarity and designs for tender stages, closing projects like TRYP By Wyndham Ribeirão Preto Hotel, a $12.0M contract.
Prepared detailed BOQs and negotiated contracts for projects including the La Vista Residencial, optimizing costs in a $4.8M agreement.
Resolved client disputes, refining processes to diminish budgetary discrepancies and boost client satisfaction.
Completed accurate BOQ preparations leading to successful tenders for high-rise residential projects, such as the Poema Castro Alves Residencial with $4.0M contracts.
Produced feasibility studies for logistics warehouse projects, aligning designs with client demands and managing costs on projects exceeding 193,752 sq ft.
metrics: Managed costs on projects exceeding 193,752 sq ft

bullets.text: Prepared comprehensive BOQ and managed on-site execution for high-profile projects like IGESP Hospital, handling a budget of $9.6M.

additionalExperience: Member of AIQS, Member of CAU BR since 2011.
